Weighted LDA Models

Source: vignettes/pkgdown_files/Weighted_LDA.Rmd
Weighted_LDA.Rmd

Weighted LDA

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
out <- keyATM(keyATM_docs       = keyATM_docs,  # text input
              no_keyword_topics = 7,            # number of regular topics
              model             = "lda",        # select the model
              options           = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##            R_1        R_2            R_3           R_4      R_5        R_6
## 1      federal    section       research       project    state       drug
## 2  information      shall       national         water    court      grant
## 3         loan        act        science administrator   person        use
## 4       entity      state     technology      wildlife   action    control
## 5       safety subsection         change           use  federal  substance
## 6          use  secretary      committee        system   united  community
## 7      patient    program    information  conservation      law prevention
## 8       direct        may     scientific       federal    class   practice
## 9      product        sec administration       coastal attorney evaluation
## 10    borrower       year         global    management    crime  treatment
##           R_7
## 1       child
## 2     license
## 3     foreign
## 4       minor
## 5  commercial
## 6       space
## 7         new
## 8      permit
## 9     require
## 10      abuse

Weighted LDA HMM

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
bills_time_index <- keyATM_data_bills$time_index
bills_time_index <- as.integer(bills_time_index - 100)
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
fitted <- keyATM(keyATM_docs       = keyATM_docs,  # text input
                 no_keyword_topics = 7,            # number of regular topics
                 model             = "ldahmm",     # select the model
                 model_settings    = list(time_index = bills_time_index, 
                                       num_states = 5),
                 options           = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##            R_1        R_2            R_3           R_4      R_5        R_6
## 1      federal    section       research       project    state       drug
## 2  information      shall       national         water    court      grant
## 3         loan        act        science administrator   person        use
## 4       entity      state     technology      wildlife   action    control
## 5       safety subsection         change           use  federal  substance
## 6          use  secretary      committee        system   united  community
## 7      patient    program    information  conservation      law prevention
## 8       direct        may     scientific       federal    class   practice
## 9      product        sec administration       coastal attorney evaluation
## 10    borrower       year         global    management    crime  treatment
##           R_7
## 1       child
## 2     license
## 3     foreign
## 4       minor
## 5  commercial
## 6       space
## 7         new
## 8      permit
## 9     require
## 10      abuse
